title: When Bunnies Attack
description: Coming soon...This is not your average love story—there’s too many cheesy innuendos, strange names for body parts, and run-ins with purple silicone rabbits.Piper isn’t your average girl. She’s hyper, crazy, and quite possibly the strangest, horniest person the average Noah Levine has ever met.An accident on the stairs leads the two on many serendipitous meetings, until Noah finally gets her number. But can Noah handle Piper in all her flighty, bunny obsessed glory? Can his flashlight?A tale of purple bunnies, fate, flashlights, and a lot of LOL.
author: K.I. Lynn
